1691380.name: One thousand baht simulator
1691380.description:
What could be better than admiring your 1000 own baht in a wonderful?
Your baht will not run away, no one will steal it - it will always be waiting for you in the same place!
Turn your ordinary, everyday baht - into baht that will never leave you, that you can endlessly admire and of course spend all your free time with it!

Use mouse to rotate Press the wheel mouse to zoom.

No level, No powerups, No character No rpg, fps and shooter but It is a simulation to see a thousand baht.

Good Luck

highlighted.name: Welcome to One thousand baht simulator
